name: MS Dox
description:
This is my first unity game!

An old school terminal style game. You want nostalgia, there you go.

MS Dox is a ripoff version of the old MS Dos OS. MS-DOS is an operating system for x86-based personal computers mostly developed by Microsoft. Collectively, MS-DOS, its rebranding as IBM PC DOS, and some operating systems attempting to be compatible with MS-DOS, are sometimes referred to as "DOS".

You are Dylan, the hacker. Your job is to use MS Dox to doxx your local cafe, discord HQ, or Bogre HQ. Crack the anagram passcodes to proceed! From Cupon Codes to Secret Files, we have everything!

Can you do it?

Thanks to @Seminix for playtesting the game for me!
